amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce forest timber sales management funding by $24 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to allocate National Forest System funding of $196.8 million for timber sales management, $120.4 million for wildlife and fisheries habitat management, and $40.1 million for watershed improvements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wu amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 250 (Roll no. 293).
